featured.text: What does the word “cash-strapped” in the second paragraph mean? (A) Making a lot of money.
This is certainly good news for cash-strapped students.
With the worsening of global economic conditions, it seems wiser and more _____ to keep cash in the bank rather than to invest in the stock market.

definition.zh_def: 現金；可立即使用的貨幣。
definition.en_def: Money in the form of coins or banknotes, as opposed to checks, credit, or electronic payments.
definition.example: I prefer to pay in cash rather than using my credit card.
